title: Laundry service in PES Electronic City campus!(3rd Sem)
content: Just wanted to know how good is the laundry at the campus hostel. How often is that clothes get stolen/missing? Is it worth giving some of my expensive clothes there?

comments.body:
If you don’t want to
There’s a spin cycle nearby where they do your laundry
Kind of expensive though
What do you have to say about the in campus laundry facility EC CAMPUS? Do they ruin good clothes/white clothes?
They won't ruin it but if your cloth size is L, they will make it S and return back
